thread.title: Libya bans Yemenis, Iranians, Pakistanis from entry
thread.title_full: Libya bans Yemenis, Iranians, Pakistanis from entry | News24

author: news24.com
title: Libya bans Yemenis, Iranians, Pakistanis from entry
text:
Benghazi - Libya's internationally recognised administration based in the east has banned Yemenis, Iranians and Pakistanis from entering the divided country, a military statement said on Tuesday.
The move widens a visa ban already applied to Sudanese, Bangladeshis, Palestinians and Syrians.
Prime Minister Abdullah al-Thinni runs only a rump state in eastern Libya after a rival group seized Tripoli a year ago, setting up its own parliament and a government not recognised by world powers.
Thinni's government and allied security forces would therefore only be able to enforce the ban at the eastern airports of Tobruk and Labraq and the land crossing with Egypt.
